text: “M’menemo muli zizindikiro zoonekera (zozindikiritsa kupatulika kwake ndi ukale wake); ndi pamalo pomwe Ibrahim adali kuimilira; ndipo amene akulowamo amakhala m’chitetezo; ndipo Allah walamula anthu kuti akachite Hajj ku nyumbayo amene angathe kukonzekera ulendo wonka kumeneko. Ndipo yemwe angakane, (osapitako pomwe ali nazo zomuyenereza), ndithudi, Allah Ngwachikwanekwane pa zolengedwa Zake
